name: Christmascountdown
0:
”Alexa, open how many days”
”Alexa, start how many days”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: how many days
des:
A Christmas Day countdown. Alexa will take this skill, under the skill name of "Blue Prints". It will count down on a daily basis, how many days until Christmas. So we can CELEBRATE the birth Of Jesus Christ. 
 *If this is against your religion or beliefs, please move on. This is intended ONLY for CHRISTIANS and other religions that beleive and knows, CHRIST EXISTS and is OUR "Lord and Savior".** This is MY RIGHT to my 2nd amendment. Thank you and hopefully you'll enjoy this homemade blue print.
